titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 5297) to create the Small Business Lending Fund Program to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to make capital investments in eligible institutions in order to increase the availability of credit for small businesses, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-508, by Mr. Perlmutter.

Pursuant to H.Res. 1436, during further consideration of H.R 5297, it shall be in order to consider the amendments printed in the report of the committee on Rules accompanying this resolution as though they were the last two amendments printed in part C of House Report 111-506.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 204.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1448.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 241 - 179 (Roll no. 368).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 179 (Roll no. 369).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/16/2010--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5297 (Small Business Lending Fund Act of 2010).
